attributes.action: Remove the Headmistress (Andrea Chapman) of Lydd Primary School, Kent in order to save any more animals from slaughter and to protect the mental well being of Lydd students. In memory of Marcus.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition will be delivered to 10 Downing Street in order to protest against the slaughter of Marcus, the Lydd Primary School Lamb. However, we are not just protesting the mindless slaughter of Marcus. We are protesting the conduct and governance of Andrea Chapman, the Headmistress who wishes to run her school like a farm and business. A school is a place of education, not a place of slaughter. The pupils of Lydd Primary School have already suffered enough mental anguish. Save the future animals of Lydd Primary School, protect the mental well being of students - Remove Andrea Chapman!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
